description: Splits date values into new columns.

input.name: data
input.description: The datatable containing the date column to be split.

input.name: source
input.description: The name of the column containing date/time values.

input.name: year
input.description:
The name of the column to hold year values.
If unspecified, defaults to `year`.

input.name: month
input.description:
The name of the column to hold month values.
If unspecified, defaults to `month`.

input.name: day
input.description:
The name of the column to hold day values.
If unspecified, defaults to `day`.

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable with year, month, and day columns added.
